headline: Ask HN: Proper Tab Management for Firefox?
description:
I've been using chrome always since it got released, but firefox consumes about 25% less battery.

I have optimized Chrome for max performance at the cost of power usage (using chrome://flags and command line switches). I don't feel like having multiple chrome configs. I'd like to give firefox a chance, maybe it has some benefits over chrome.

But wtf? Is there really no proper add-on for managing tabs and windows such as Session Buddy for chrome?

For example Tab Session Manager for firefox only shows previously closed sessions. Every other add-on I try is seriously lacking in basic functionality such rearranging, searching, and closing tabs/windows.

Importing and exporting, renaming sessions.

Tabby for example has only a tiny 800x600 pop up window. Manage 100+ tabs in that? pass. (I do lots of researching).

Can anyone save firefox?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 火狐的正确标签管理？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 火狐的正確標籤管理？
description_zh-Hans:
自从chrome发布以来，我一直在使用它，但firefox的电池消耗量要少25%。

我已经优化了Chrome的最大性能，但以电力使用为代价（使用chrome://flags和命令行开关）。我不喜欢有多个Chrome配置。我想给firefox一个机会，也许它比chrome有一些好处。

但是，wtf？难道真的没有像chrome的Session Buddy那样的管理标签和窗口的适当插件吗？

例如，firefox的Tab Session Manager只显示以前关闭的会话。我所尝试的其他插件都严重缺乏基本功能，如重新安排、搜索和关闭标签/窗口。

导入和导出，重命名会话。

例如，Tabby只有一个800x600的小弹出窗口。在这里面管理100多个标签吗？通过。(我做了很多研究）。

有人能拯救火狐吗？
